main-form.title: List and Manage Your Property
main-form.par: List on Rentorr.com, accept applications and request screenings for all potential tenants.

what.title: What is Rentorr?
what.desc:
We're changing the property management game for the better.
Our easy-to-use application allows you to list properties, collect rental applications, and pay rent in one convenient space.

item.desc: Renting your property is a breeze with Rentorr-simply write up your listing and we'll syndicate it within our partner network so you get more quality rental applications.
Simplify the landlord and tenant relationship right from the start by running background and credit checks along with eviction reports with just the click of a button.

It's the digital age; that means it's time to stop wondering how to collect rent from tenants online, and to start finding a solution. Rentorr makes it easy to receive secure payments directly to your bank account.
Our software will compile all of the interested tenants in one place on your dashboard so you can more easily begin sifting through them to schedule showings.
Post and review tenant application forms easily online with Rentorr so you can start looking through them immediately and get your property rented faster.

No matter how many properties you own, maintenance is one of the most difficult parts of managing property. Rentorr allows you to prioritize and work through maintenance requests on one digital platform.

question.title: So, you’re a landlord?
question.desc: Residential and commercial property management are about to get a whole lot more manageable with Rentorr. Plus, it's free to use*!
question.text: When you list your property rentals with Rentorr, you can accept applications, screen potential tenants, and even schedule showings all from a single dashboard. Once you select a tenant, it's never been easier to manage property, either - accept online rent payments and handle maintenance requests from that same platform.

property.title: Property Management at Your Fingertips-For Free!
property.desc: Rentorr allows you to advertise your property, look through applications, screen possible tenants, and even accept online rent payments from a single, convenient place. No sneaky set up charges, no monthly fees to worry about, no catch-just convenience.
property.text: Being a busy doctor in the ER and father of 3, I don’t have as much time to manage my real estate properties. Rentorr makes it so easy and saves me time, that’s the time I get back to spend with my family. I appreciate the value that Rentorr provides.

tenat.title: But I’m a tenant!
tenat.desc: Great, we're here to help you, too.
tenat.text: Rentorr will help you find the property of your dreams, and you'll never again miss out on a perfect space because your application wasn't at the top of the stack.

secure.title: Get The Right Place at The Right Price

list-box.list: Pay one application fee and apply to multiple properties
Apply online in a matter of minutes

operation.title: Rentorr - The Software That Handles Property Management from Start to Finish

ready.title: Ready to Work with Rentorr?
ready.desc: Living in a rental property doesn't have to feel like hard work. Rentorr is here to improve the landlord and tenant relationship so you can enjoy an easier lifestyle without having to pay for it.
